name: CXCallController
desc: A programmatic interface for interacting with and observing calls.

items.name: callObserver
items.desc: Returns an observer for active calls.

items.name: CXErrorCodeRequestTransactionError.Code
items.desc: Error codes for the CallKit Constants error domain.

items.name: CXErrorDomainRequestTransaction
items.desc: Domain for errors when requesting a transaction from a call controller. See CallKit Constants for possible error codes.
